articles.title: Finke shatters world record in golden 1,500 swim - ESPN
articles.description: Bobby Finke set a world record to become the only American male swimmer to win individual gold in Paris, while the women's 4x100-meter relay team also set a world record.
articles.content:

NANTERRE, France -- The United States set two world records on the final night of swimming at the Paris Olympics on Sunday, winning the gold medal count ove… [+2662 chars]
